titleStmt.title: Instructions and aduertisements, how to meditate the misteries of the rosarie of the most holy Virgin Mary. Written in Italian by the Reuerend Father Gaspar Loarte D. of Diuinite of the Societie of Iesus. And newly translated into English
Meditationes de rosario B. Virginis. English
titleStmt.author: Loarte, Gaspar de, 1498-1578.

titleStmt.title: Instructions and aduertisements, how to meditate the misteries of the rosarie of the most holy Virgin Mary. Written in Italian by the Reuerend Father Gaspar Loarte D. of Diuinite of the Societie of Iesus. And newly translated into English
Meditationes de rosario B. Virginis. English
titleStmt.author: Loarte, Gaspar de, 1498-1578.
Fenn, John, 1535-1614.

notesStmt.note: A translation, by John Fenn, of: Loarte, Gaspar. Meditationes de rosario B. Virginis.
Cf. Folger catalogue, which gives signatures: 2*⁴ A-P Q⁴.
The last three leaves are numbered 123, 125, unnumbered.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
